Ratings.comment: Professor doesnt do much for the class- all work is passed through TA that likely doesnt know what theyre doing. Rubrics are confusing and arbitrary. Professor doesnt work canvas well and due dates arent accurately posted. Avoid this class if you can
She is way too smart, and needs to learn how to dumb down the information for her students. Hardest class ive ever taken. Also sucks at emailing you back
